ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So they set off, quietly saying to one another,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So they departed, talking in low voices:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So off they went, whispering to one another:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They all left, whispering to one another,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So they went off, while whispering to one another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So they departed, and they were whispering:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So they went, while they consulted together secretly,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So they went off, saying one unto another in low tones:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So they went off, whispering to one another,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So they went off speaking to each other in a low voice:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So off they went, murmuring to one another:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So they departed, conversing in secret low tones, (saying)-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So they departed, conversing in secret low tones (saying),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And so they departed, whispering to one another:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So off they went, murmuring to one another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So they set out, while lowering their voices,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [68:23] So off they went, whispering to one another, talking secretly:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So they went off) towards the fields, (saying one unto another in low tones:
